definition: to roll up into a ball with one's hands/spiral/circle/variant of 團|团[tuan2]
"hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized
lacking in cohesion and unity of purpose
to rise very quickly
to roll rice balls
Chen Tuan (871-989), a legendary Daoist sage
to strive for greatness

sentences.english: Blessed shall be thy basket and thy store.
sentences.chinese: 你的筐子和你的摶面盆都必蒙福。

sentences.english: Remember, I beseech thee, that thou hast made me as the clay; and wilt thou bring me into dust again?
sentences.chinese: 求你記念製造我如摶泥一般，你還要使我歸於塵土嗎？

sentences.english: His wife died after an agonizing three-year siege of cancer.
sentences.chinese: 他的妻子和癌症摶鬥三年後辭世。

sentences.english: Cursed shall be thy basket and thy store.
sentences.chinese: 17你的筐子和你的摶面盆都必受咒詛。

sentences.english: Your basket and your kneading trough will be blessed.
sentences.chinese: 5你的筐子和你的摶面盆都必蒙福。

definition: center or bull's eye of an archery target (old)/goal/target
swan
variant of 御[yu4]/to drive/to manage/to control
ichthyosaur
fire beacon (used as alarm signal over long distance)
mythological bird, reincarnation of drowned daughter Nüwa 女娃[Nu:3 wa2] of Fiery Emperor 炎帝[Yan2 di4]
zouyu (mythical animal)/official in charge of park animals/name of an archaic ceremonial tune
to hasten/to run/to open up/to gallop
legendary dragon with the ability to control rain and floods
arable fields/cultivated field/class/category
whirlwind/stormy wind
mountain stream

lay hands on/to cover
